Speaker Profile

Melissa Conley Tyler

National Executive Director

Australian Institute of International Affairs

Melissa Conley Tyler is the National Executive Director of the Australian Institute of International Affairs, an independent non-profit organisation ranked the top think tank in Southeast Asia and the Pacific in the Global Go To Think Tanks Index for the last two years. She is the Team Leader of the EU-Australia Leadership Forum.
